reviews_data.review_text: This coffee shop has a great atmosphere, good food and amazing coffee. 100% recommend!!!
Great coffee and even better people
Nice place for a meet and greet. The environment is warm and welcoming and you can have good conversation over coffee.

Enderly reminds me of why I support small businesses. This place houses exceptional people, friendly smiles, and excellent service every single time I drop by. The cherry on top? Fabulous & ethical coffee!

Such a great place! First and foremost the coffee is delicious, but the staff make the cafe an exceptional place to enjoy the coffee. Both Mariah and Michelle gave expert recommendations and made my children and I feel so welcome. A must try if you're ever in the neighborhood.
The coffee is great for starters but good coffee is everywhere. The friendliest staff and the beautiful atmosphere is why I come back. See you tomorrow Mariah and Michelle!!!!

Had some extra time to check out a new coffee shop. Journeyed to Enderly. Enjoyed the environment, a welcoming space with character. Ordered a seasonal latte, Salted Maple w/ Oat milk. Really took time to enjoy the moment. The latte was warm and delightful. Mariah did a wonderful job crafting my drink. She is helpful and informative. Both baristas are friendly. I'm looking forward to trying the pastries next time.

Enderly is always a great experience. The vanilla latte is my go-to - just the right amount of vanilla but doesn't overpower the coffee. Not to mention how kind and helpful the staff is - TeCoby, Drea, Tony, Mariah, and Michelle always have a smile and are happy to answer any questions I have!
I live in the neighborhood and make a point to stop by Enderly Coffee everyday. Kemoy, Mariah and Michelle are pure joy, and I'm thankful for each of them!

The atmosphere was great.  They were playing Bob Marley and the art inside looked awesome.  I got an iced chai latte and it was one of the best ones that I have ever had.  The chai also came out before my friend's coffee which never happens.  I also got a chocolate croissant.  It was good but could have had a bit more chocolate inside.

The coffee is amazing but the staff is even better. Mariah was more than happy to help us navigate Charlotte. Definitely worth a visit just for service, the quality of the coffee is an additional benefit.

Me and my friends came down to visit from Florida and Mariah was an absolute drop of sunshine. Other than the coffee being fantastic and the vibes being perfect. The staff was the real reason to come. She helped us navigate the city and gave us a bunch of recommendations. Overall the coffee tastes better when you're in good company. Thank you!
Amazing coffee, better service. We're visiting from out of town and Mariah recommended a week's worth of stops for us
I had a lovely experience over the weekend. Mariah was a pleasure! She knew my order down to the T. She's the best!
Mariah and Michelle always look out for me. My go to coffee spot!
Mariah recommended a really nice medium roast and we had a great conversation about the expanding area. Will definitely be back
I had a great first experience. Mariah was impeccable and made me feel right at home! I would highly recommend!
Mariah gave us one of the best experiences I've had. I mentioned I was pregnant and she recommended a couple of different teas that would sooth and relax me. Really amazing service, & awesome tea!
Mariah is amazing. I come in 3 times a week and she always greets me with a smile. The coffee is great and the vibes are always on point. I recommend the iced caramel macchiato üòé
Lovely atmosphere, lovely people & some wonderful coffee! Out of the many coffee shops in the area, this place feels warm & welcoming. Be sure to add this shop onto your must-try list!

The coffee here is smooth and doesn't taste bitter or burnt. They have a selection of merchandise as well as coffee beans for sale. Nice aesthetic makes it an ideal place to study or just to hang out and have a cup of coffee over a good conversation. 5/5 great place, good coffee üëç

First time visit..... I don't do many reviews, but wanted to share my visit to Enderly.  The coffee was great and the customer service was even better.  The atmosphere in this coffee shop was nice and both employees were very friendly.  It's great to see them take pride in their community.  I definitely recommend you give them a try.
The customer service was absolutely wonderful. The workers are so nice and recommended very great drinks for us. The blue jasmine iced tea and the cold brew was phenomenal.
My simple black medium roast drip coffee was fantastic. Sounds easy to do, but a lot of shops around here miss the mark. The cherry and cheese pastry was also great.
Not big, but wonderful coffee and service. Best decaf anywhere. The perfect balance of smooth and strong. Try a double decaf espresso.
Great coffee and service
Stopped in, bought some coffee beans, apple, and fruit danishes. Very wonderful staff, no paper reciepts, plenty of parking. Outside dining, belly up table. Very clean.
The coffee here is amazing, and it's in walking distance. People often rave about Starbucks. This coffee taste fresh and fantastic.
We come here often and the coffee never misses. The atmosphere is great and the baristas are nice. Friendly staff and overall a great cafe.
Amazing latte, amazing staff, amazing experience. Stopped in for caffeine and ended up finding a hidden gem. 10/10

My girlfriend and I have been ordering coffee from Enderly Coffee Company for almost a year. Our espresso machine has held nothing but Enderly beans since we moved to Charlotte, and we are slowly making our way through every kind of bean they offer for our daily coffee. Their Friday home delivery is such an excellent service--every time I run low on beans, I just hop on and pick a new bag to be dropped off at my doorstep for free that Friday--and every time we've been in the shop we are just so pleased by the kindness of those behind the counter. Tony Santoro has personally helped me skip subscription orders if I'm not going through beans as fast and he even helped me exchange a shirt I bought without even having to come in the shop. There are always new treats from local places popping up for Friday delivery and we love checking them out. I'm just so happy a place like this exists in my community and I'm excited to continue to drink Enderly Coffee for years to come.

I don't drink coffee, and I love this place.  Quieter than most coffee shops, it is an oasis in a busy world.  The staff are friendly and capable, the selection is strong (about 6-8 choices for a tea drinker and the smoothies are excellent, too). High-ceiling space with outdoor seating as well.
Amazing place and coffee! I also picked up a book from Shelves while I was there, who is there every Saturday
Enderly was a delicious stop on our Saturday drive. A beautiful coffee shop with delicious lattes. Both of the baristas were so kind, will definitely be stopping back in!
Coffee is delicious and service is great. Love the artwork and the outdoor seating!

My rating is based on the purchase of their dark roast coffee at Harris Teeter. Every once in awhile I sway from my normal coffee brand and most often I am disappointed as I was with this blend. Very ordinary taste and not really a dark roast imho.
Yummy seasonal latte flavors!
Great cinnamon roll!!
Great coffee and lattes. Friendly staff.

Above and beyond service!! The staff even surprised me and re-made my latte that was slightly below temp, even when I told them it was fine! Loved the kids steamed drink too! And only $1.50! Great stop.
Community-focused and uplifting. :)

By giving 2 stars, I'm not saying it was a bad place in regard to the coffee, but the hours are odd (8am - 2pm) and not open on Sundays at all. Location is weird too as it is right on a very busy street with several mechanic/car mod businesses across the street and if you're sitting outside, forget having a conversation because every couple of minutes a car/motorcycle/four-wheeler takes off with full acceleration and modified exhausts that blast your eardrums. The particular staff member we encountered was not rude, per se, but definitely seemed a bit annoyed about something and was curt in his responses. I had an iced vanilla latte with oat milk and my friend had an Americano, which I had no complaints about. Don't expect much in the way of eats. The croissant was good enough and the chocolate cookie was ok, but there were literally one of each left and nothing else (we arrived an hour before closing time). Overall, I would probably not go back because there are much closer places to home with better hours and same, if not better, quality coffee.
Great brewed coffee and even better customer service and hospitality. Warm and inviting! Coby was especially helpful. Will definitely be back!
Grade aaa coffee.
The best lattes and the friendliest staff!
Love their espresso. It's so smooth and it's one of the most affordable ones. I'll never stop coming here
Lov√© this coffee shop - came in today to grab iced lattes and a bag if medium roast.  Can't recommend enough.

I have been going in periodically to grab books purchased from my fav loval bookseller (Shelves Bookstore) and would always grab a coffee. I love sitting in their cozy shop, cracking open my new book, and sipping my coffee. Soon enough I decided it was my favorite coffee in town, so I signed up for the bi-weekly subscription (Ethopian beans) and have been so pleased. They mail promptly each time and so far have arrived the next day!
Cute little place in the steady gentrified community.  Not too much parking but it'll do for a quick run.  They have pastries and t-shirts also.

I love coffee so much and I especially love Enderly Coffee Conpany. I love their Sweater Weather blend so much that I bought a 5 pound bag. I've also had many lattes there  and they're all delicious. Such a cute space. I only wish they were open later in the day. Can't wait to go back.

Our favorite source for fresh whole beans in the Charlotte area! Also available for purchase at other local markets but if we can get them straight from the source why not? Our faves are the Honduras and Guatemalan for espresso, their espresso roasts are a little darker than our preference but still excellent and pull a mean shot

We had such a nice experience here. The staff was kind, the atmosphere of the shop was welcoming but modern, and they had a nice patio area so we could enjoy our drinks with our dog. The options were plentiful and they had a few seasonal items as well. Their merch and take home options were awesome as well.
Haven't had any of their drinks but their bens are top notch *chef's kiss*

Coffee roasters but they also sell brewed coffee.  We stopped by and got a black, a chai and a pumpkin pie latte, all of which were delicious.  It is a small parking lot but easy parking and a nice open shop inside
It's so cute here and I always try their seasonal drinks! Not too far from my house either, staff are so friendly and made me feel welcomedüíõüíõ
What a cute little coffee place! Friendly staff who were super outgoing. The atmosphere and espresso were also excellent!
Very impressed by their customer service and coffee. We stopped here on our way to the airport. Would love to return for the coffee
Simply the best coffee in Charlotte, NC. Incredibly kind service, a certified generous business for their contributions into their community.
Tony and his team have created something special here.
Probably my favorite coffee in town

Best coffee in town, hands down! And that's saying something because there are a lot of good coffee roasters in CLT these days. The State Street roast is my favorite; I start everyday with a hot cup from the French Press at home. Love this neighborhood coffee shop, just a short bike ride down the street from my house. Good vibes and good people. Always run into someone I know. Great gathering place for the community. A nice hub to bring people together. Oh, and I love the pastries on Fridays! : )
Great local coffee shop with super nice employees!
Super nice atmosphere, great customer service, and coffee is great!!! Will be back

We have loved their coffee and caring relationships from their beginning.  Now the favorite Friday's are there delivery of coffee and goodies from some special new business in Charlotte.  My family and my friends at Aldersgate enjoy them.
Fast, friendly service

A great, artsy space with a community feel. Nice to see a spot like this creating some vitality in a rougher part of town. The coffee itself is fine - but weak. Very milky. A bit stronger would be very good. This place has great potential.
Great coffee!  Nice folks!
Fantastic product in the state street Coffee. We've been brewing with the beans pretty exclusively for the last couple of years. Highly recommended.
Good coffee
Best coffee in the world!
Delicious coffee, friendly baristas, and cute shop!! If I lived in Charlotte I would absolutely be a regular!

Really liked the creative interior! Fantastic quality coffee and personable, friendly staff! Really can't ask for anything else! Plenty of space inside to read/relax and seating outside for some fresh air. They also have baked goods.
Love the staff and the drinks!!
Unless I'm desperate or don't have a choice, Enderly is the only place I buy beans. It's the first coffee my wife and I have agreed on in years.  State Street Blend is legit, great jo.
Great coffee and the best management! Very satisfied with Friday Delivery order which included Virtuoso Bread pastries. Highly recommend!
Love this local shop.  I go there to get 5lb bags to brew at home.  The coffee is excellent, the staff is friendly and they always have roasted coffee in stock to buy.
Everything from the staff to the drinks are top notch!
Awesome shop, very friendly workers and great coffee and good prices.
super nice worker!!  great coffee
Quaint and friendly
Beautiful space inside and out.  The coffee was superb as was the service.  Highly recommend.
Bought some beans for making coffee at home. Definitely never going back to grocery store stuff! Get your coffee locally roasted - it really does make a difference.
Awesome atmosphere and Staff. Great coffee and teas. Yummyüòãüòãüòã pastries

I love Enderly coffee so much. If you want to support locals who work really hard to make a great product and love their community, these guys do it so well. Pro tip: try the homemade gingerbead latte in the winter! Absolutely perfect.
Wonderful environment and mission!

Good coffee! Enjoyed the atmosphere inside the shop, it's very purposefully and thoughtfully designed. The employees were friendly and the service was good. The location isn't the best area in the city necessarily, but the Enderly is well done and nice inside.
Order the coffee since they do free delivery on Fridays! Very good customer service and coffee!
Enderly Coffee is my favorite coffee roaster/shop in Charlotte. Friendly service and amazing coffee.
Great coffee. Great people. A winning combination.
Smoothie was delicious.(healthy)
Loved it. Will try it again. LATTE
Friendly staff and amazing coffee!!
Nice local shop with great coffee!
One of the best, if not the best, coffee in Charlotte.
FABULOUS local coffee shop. Ask for Coby! Delicious brews and you can get beans to brew at home ‚òïÔ∏è

I drove out of my way to visit Enderly and I'm so glad I did! I had a super sweet conversation with the barista as he was making my drink and I was also excited to see that they offer non-dairy milk options for your lattes. Will definitely be coming back!
Amazing coffee, great environment, and the barista was very nice! Will definitely be returning.
Fantastic people, drinks, and atmosphere
Had fone of the best cups of coffee I''ve ever had from this place yesterday!
Best iced latte I've ever had!
Always on top of the game! Great local coffee and outstanding service at an awesome price!
Enderly is not only a coffee shop but community! They have delicious coffee and always a great convo. Thank you, Enderly for all that you do!

This local coffee shop and roastery is easily my new favorite place. (Plus it isn't even fair to compare them to Starbucks because their coffee would kick Starbuck's coffee's butt). Every time I've gone in, I'm greet with smiles and genuine kindness. I love the character and warmth of the place. Be it the yummy coffee or the atmosphere, I always leave there with a smile.
Coffee  was good as always. Was very poor, I had banana nut bread, old, stale and undercooked
Love it. Nice to have a nice place like this in our community.
Super chill vibe with attentive staff
All the staff is so nice and thoughtful!!!!!!!
Great coffee and kind staff.
TaColby is always a pleasure to see. The atmosphere is lovely and the drinks are amazing.
Dope shop... great coffee

I was heading back to Nashville and needed a cup of coffee for the road. I use to live in Charlotte and never saw this place as it opened up after I left.  Coming here I was very impressed by the coffee and now feel kind of sad I won't be able to try them again.  This is definitely a pretty impressive new shop and better than most any roaster I have had in Nashville.  I am from the Pacific Northwest, lived in Denver and have ordered coffees from around the country, including from California, Missouri, Illinois and New York.  I have had an appreciation for some of the best roasters in the country and I will say this stuff impressed me.  If they end up shipping and nitrogen packing their bags I may consider ordering some of this stuff.   Also, they charge very little for the quality of the coffee.   I think some of the snobby shops in Seattle could learn a thing or two about high quality and modest pricing like this shop has.   Definitely a very good micro-roaster.  I would put them and Hex at the top of roasters I have had in Charlotte.
Yum!  Happy to be able to get their coffee again.  We were introduced to them through Joe's doughs a few years back and when they closed it was hard to get their beans!
Fantastic locally roasted coffee and great people with a community focus.  Highly recommended, you gotta check them out and bring home some beans to brew for yourself!
From hot chocolate to coffee and more. Have yet to have something that isn't great! It is now my monthly tradition to go there
Love this place.  Coffee is good and music is chill.

Sweet little space. They doing good things with coffee. Engaging and inviting staff. The owner is down to earth, friendly, and has a heart for the community. Love its location. So much more then the cup of coffee.

Tony and company are awesome! They have been engaged in the west Charlotte community for years. They produce an excellent product, served consistently, and are social entrepreneurs who have helped create opportunity in the Tuckaseegee/Parkview/Enderly corridor. They are an asset to the community and to morning wake up routines!
This place embodies what a coffee shop should be: community. Customer service is exceptional and coffee is delicious!

Enjoyed my time here. I've been back four times and bought beans, so you know it's good.  Owner was very nice and down to earth, other barista is always nice as well.  They have a perks program which is nice, and give coupons to first time customers.  The coffee has a very clean mellow taste. We have had the salted maple latte, vanilla latte, pumpkin pie latte, caramel latte, and some smoky one ( can't remember the name) all were delicious  Prices are about standard for a coffee shop. Place is clean, and has a nice vibe. Only down side would be lack of outlets. The tables to the right only have outlets and seem to always be used because of it. It would be nice to have useable outlets in other sections.
Friendly service, high quality products, good atmosphere üëåüèº
Very nice place new to the HUD
PUMPKIN PIE latte üòã the coffee here is outstanding and the barista is super friendly -highly recommend this shop!
Love the vibe of this place. Great coffee, music, and art

First time in this place and Tecoby made me feel like a regular right off the bat.  They've got a selection of healthy and more decadent snacks to accompany their excellent coffee.  The Americano was strong and honest.  I look forward to trying their sombucha kombucha and some of their fall specialty drinks when it starts FEELING like fall up in this place.  All in all, the vibe is what's going to make this my new go-to for coffee.  The music's present but not overwhelming.  Fast internet.  And a place where the barista made the effort right away to know my name, ask a few questions about who I am and where I live, and get me set up for that dark elixir of life that keeps me from hatin' on people when they don't use their noggins.  Good folks, good products, good prices.  Solid.
Best cappuccino in North Carolina

The very friendly barista helped me pick out an amazing carmel latte. My husband had a chai latte. Both were among the best we have had in Charlotte. The atmosphere was laid back, and they have something for everyone. They have games and stuff for children and a nice quiet place to hang out for coffee lovers. We went for a very funny comedy open mic event hosted by Adrian Michelle Freeman.

Enderly Coffee is an entire mood. It's a family-owned business and they're very focused on the surrounding community. You should definitely stop by if you're ever in West Charlotte, especially when they host Shelves Pop-Up Bookstore.
Super friendly guy working who gave us some coupons, and great coffee and cheese danishes! Nice vibe and very clean too

We found Enderly Coffee while coming from the Charlotte Douglas Airport area on. Friday morning.  It was the only coffee shop in the area and located in an area that has been known to be sketchy.  We were absolutely blown away by how great this place is.  The building and decor are well designed the interior is spacious well decorated.  We loved the musically inspired art and theme #thisishowwebrewit. The vibe and ambiance is everything we would want to have in a local coffee shop.  Tacoby was our barista and we enjoyed the drinks as well as the conversation.  We were able to setup office for a few hours and get things done.  We wish we had Enderly out in Cornelius, NC!  We will be back whenever on that end of Charlotte.
Colby made me an iced chai latte with oat milk, no expresso, and I've official called it The Spiced Oat!! Thanks Colby!! #sotasty
My place for roasted coffee beans!

Coolest spot for coffee on this end of town! It's a great space to get out of the house to get some work done or just to get together with some friends and hang out! Coffee is super delicious and the staff is incredibly friendly and knowledgeable.
A wonderful coffee shop run by one of the most genuinely good people you've ever meet. Tony and his whole team are amazing, and their coffee is outrageously good. Don't miss this spot!
Tecoby Hines is a great rapper and barista.

I love everything about Enderly! James and Colby (So sorry if I misspelled his name!) are always so warm, welcoming, and helpful.  They were trying out decaf espresso for their lattes when I went in (I'm preggo so had no choice haha) and Tony, the amazing owner, gave me a drink on the house to test out their decaf latte.  It was amazing, as is all of the other coffee I have ever had there.  Just had to give a shout-out for their continued wonderful customer service and delicious coffee :)
Best roaster in town, buy a bag get a free drip coffee when you do! Medium roasts are so dang flavorful.
I've made it a Friday tradition to stop thru on my way into work for a cold brew (during the Summer). Not only is the coffee good, but Tony and the rest of his crew are super friendly.
Cool place with good people and coffee
Enderly is,  by a large margin,  my favorite roaster.
Loved the coffee and friendly staff
Super nice people! Lovely and inviting environment! And the coffee is SUPERB! We're just passing through, but if I were a local I'd be here every day. The Honey Bee Latte is to die for!

Terrific coffee house - and the only one near my place in the Thomasborough neighborhood so I'm especially happy.  Excellent coffee and chai and all the usual liquid pleasures + some things to eat, all presented in a casual chic atmosphere that even has a little play kitchen for kids (brilliant!).  Onsite parking, a patio, wifi, very clean, & great staff.

Always a great coffee, and truly a part of the neighborhood. And a great place to meet whether for business or pleasure. Saturday morning cinnamon rolls are fantastic. Especially when you go on your birthday and your family buys you a coffee grinder.

The blue jasmine tea is this gorgeous blue color and delightfully floral and not overly sweet. Coffee here is also delicious. Cutr "mini cafe" for kids to play in. Beautiful wood furnishing locally made. Friendly staff making you feel welcome. Parking lot in back. Reward program as well!
Love the coffee and the cinnamon rolls and the cheeses Danish. Great vibe in this place.
If you haven't tried the Ethiopian, you're missing out on one of God's gifts to mankind.
Great coffee, great atmosphere, great people. James, Tony, and the other staff are awesome and will take care of you. Definitely check it out!

Hospitality on point, coffee as well. The vibe is something unique that you don't find much in Charlotte, and the staff here understands how to make people feel comfortable.  I'm here right now chilling with Coby and James.
Very good Coffee

This place is like that line from the Cheers theme song... "Sometimes you want to go where everybody knows your name and they're always glad you came." The coffee is fantastic, the hospitality is top notch, and there is not a day I don't see a friend, neighbor, or colleague walk through the doors.

Enderly Coffee is such a great place to grab some coffee, do some work, have meetings, or hang out with friends. They are friendly and knew me by name by my second visit. They make the extra effort to serve you well and the coffee is good! What more could you want? Best vibe period.

Creating a true neighborhood coffeeshop experience.   Loved my interaction with the staff and what I saw with others who were clearly regulars. #Honey Bee Latte is almost too good to have to go to work after having.   Should be reading a good book on the porch... Stopped by on a whim,  will return on purpose.
Outstanding. Great company. Great for the community. Great coffee selection
Excelent service! The drinks are delicious. The atmosphere is warm and inviting.
Socially conscious roaster and cafe. I love this place!
My favorite!!!
Excellent little coffee shop.  I will be back

Overall a GREAT Coffee house , the vibe is impossible to describe you feel like trendy people are here as well as a fantastic mixture of just regular neighborhood folk and customers who are both young & old. The BEST part about it is the more than Warm & Welcoming staff who are so friendly as well as every other customer here was.
Nice people. Strong coffee.
Excellent coffee and people, love what they're doing!

I've checked out Enderly a few times for a coffee and a pastry on the weekend and love it!  The staff is always pleasant and the coffee is some of the best in Charlotte.  If you're in the mood for a sweet treat, the white peppermint mocha is wonderful and the cinnamon roles are huge.

Went yesterday for the 1st time about an hour before closing.. thought i was gonna be in & out but the atmosphere and the friendly barista made my boyfriend & i want to stay & enjoy ! My caramel latte & his cherry danish were perfect! cant wait to go back!
Always feel welcomed when I come in. It's a great neighborhood spot. Tony and James make a great team. But man, the fresh roasted coffee is amazing! Shoutout to the roaster!

I would've given this coffee shop 5 stars for the coffee, and the service I received from the Barista, but it is not a black owned establishment. Judging from the decor, pictures on the wall and the Barista, it gives off the impression that it is. It appears that the Owners want to draw in customers under false pretenses. I grew up in this neighborhood, and although I appreciate the diversity it brings to the neighborhood, I would just prefer that the Owners be transparent. I'm sure the locals will still support it regardless. We love lattes too!
New place,  great coffee really cool place
Good people. Good coffee.
Great coffee and atmosphere!

Great people and great coffee. Awesome customer service. We were heading out of toen and stopped at Enderly to pick up our 5 pound bag of dutch chocolate before we headed to the mountains for a long weekend only to discover they had shipped the coffee to our house. They offered 5 one pound bags on the spot to take with us until we got home to get our coffee in the mail. We only took 1 because that was more than enough to get us through the long weekend but the offer and gesture was much appreciated!
Great experience good customer service.
This is a hidden gem, great coffee
Great place and vibe. Awesome people that have been extra cool and helpful when I haven't had enough caffeine to even properly order coffee.
Fantastic!
Great coffee and service! Super nice atmosphere! Will go back and highly recommend!
Fantastic latte.  They know how to make a perfect coffee.  Highly recommended!  Our new favorite coffee shop.

Enderly Coffee is an inclusive community focused coffee shop with incredible coffee and espresso. The owner and all staff are genuine members of the community their shop is located in. The atmosphere is calm and welcoming, and is the perfect spot for everything from business meetings to a quiet place to reflect or get some work done. The patio has sun and shade in the morning! Again, outstanding shop, and I can't wait to come back for more.
Loved the vibe this coffee shop has. The best cold brew I have had! Will always stop in when in Charlotte.
Solid coffee, great staff. The owner is a great person making a positive change in his community.
Extremely friendly service, no line at 8am, and my cortado came out very fast!
Love the blueberry brew
Their customer service is awesome! They made me a very custom drink and have great attitudesüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª
The chai latte was even better than Smelly Cat!  Very impressed, I will be back!
Love the place, people and community-minded heart of the concept!

Enderly Coffee Company is the best way to not only spend a work morning, but the best way to spend your money. I can feel good knowing my money is going to a people who are "for people", creating jobs and for the coffee bean farmer, loving people well, and roasting and brewing a perfect cup to ignite your day! The cinnamon rolls they serve on Saturdays look divine - that's on my list this coming Saturday! Great new place to grab a cup of coffee!

What a neat, sweet spot in West Charlotte for coffee and treats.  Cutest setup, great staff and simply amazing coffee.  Been 5x in seven days and the quality and consistency is there for sure.  Kudos to Enderly for planting a flag in the neighborhood.  Diamond in the hood!
Mmmm... leftovers! What a nice place! Enjoyed the people, cookie and the coffee.
Atmosphere ‚úÖ Service ‚úÖ Coffee‚úÖ Go check it out! Highly recommend

Best coffee in Charlotte! Locally roasted, great atmosphere and James always has the biggest smile! You can get all varieties of hot an cold coffee in addition to fresh roasted coffee beans. Highly recommend.
Great staff even better coffee.
Awesome coffee shop! Great coffee, great service and wonderful atmosphere. So happy this place opened.

This is a sweet, new coffee shop in the heart of Enderly Park.  Located in a historic, mid-20th c. building the building remodel is stunning.  Clean, fresh lines, exposed beams, all the good stuff.  As for the service and the coffee, both are top of the line.  I've tried the iced and hot coffee and both were top notch.  The owner brews all the beans himself and he and the staff are friendly and super efficient.  I'd definitely recommend stopping in to this new little gem.
This is an awesome spot.  Delicious coffee and great staff.  Enderly is also super active in their community, which is the icing on the cake.  You gotta check them out!!
Free WIFI, amazing coffee and a peaceful environment! Enderly Coffee is one of Charlotte's great new finds. Their iced caramel latte on a hot day hits all the right spots!! ‚ù§Ô∏è
